Desc.CN: Creates a blocking wall of ice. Can be destroyed be normal attacks.
你的战斗技能造成额外 %damagebonus_ 伤害，持续 120 秒。
向目标发射一块寒冰碎片，造成冰霜伤害并对普通生物冻结 1 秒， 对部落生物冻结 2 秒， 对巨人族和重甲族无法被冻结，而是在 2 秒里减速 15%。 冰箭每次击中目标可以回复 5 法力值。

effect0.CN: 造成 %skilldamage_ + %weapondamagepercent_ 伤害

Desc.CN: 冰箭每次击中目标可以回复法力值。

effect0.CN: 冰箭命中目标回复 %manarecharge_ 法力值

effect1.CN: 冰箭具有 %armorpiercing_ 护甲穿透。

Desc.CN: 提升冰箭减速效果

effect0.CN: 提升冰箭造成的减速效果 +%slowingincrease_

effect1.CN: 提升冰箭造成的伤害 +%damagebonus_

Desc.CN: 按住鼠标时，引导一道魔法能量射线来跟随鼠标指针方向移动，直到它碰撞到第一个障碍物时停止。(最大距离20码) 射线对撞击点 2.5码 范围内的敌人连续造成火焰/闪电伤害。

effect0.CN: %skilldamage_ (+%weapondamagepercent_) 每秒伤害

Desc.CN: Decreases the building cost of ranged traps.

effect0.CN: 降低远程类陷阱建造成本 %costdecrease_

Desc.CN: Decreases the upgrade cost of ranged traps.

effect0.CN: 降低远程类陷阱升级成本 %costdecrease_

Desc.CN: 提升 30% 移动速度\n每秒回复最大生命值 4%\n每秒回复 10 专注
对一只战斗生物进行完全控制，拥有此生物的特性和能力。

effect0.CN: 拥有并操控目标生物

Desc.CN: 释放拥有的生物，恢复你原本的形态。

effect0.CN: 解除生命契约

Desc.CN: 治疗自身生命值

effect0.CN: 治疗 %heal_ 生命值

Desc.CN: Disables a designated trap for 5 seconds. If it's a summon type trap, the summoned creatures disappear for the duration and return immediately afterwards.

effect0.CN: Disables a trap for 5 seconds

Desc.CN: All attacking creatures within 3 meters around you gain a significant movement speed boost.

effect0.CN: Significantly increases the movement speed of the attacking creatures around you

Desc.CN: You gain total immunity against all damage for 3 seconds.

effect0.CN: Grants invulnerability

Desc.CN: Places a totem at the designated location. Attacking creatures within 10 meters of the totem gain +50% movement speed. The defending player can damage and destroy the totem.

effect0.CN: +50% movement speed for creatures around the totem

Desc.CN: Places a totem at the designated location. Attacking creatures within 10 meters of the totem gain 50% damage reduction against damage from all mystic type traps.

effect0.CN: +50% damage reduction against mystic traps for creatures around the totem

Desc.CN: Places a totem at the designated location. Attacking creatures within 10 meters of the totem gain 50% damage reduction against damage from all mechanical type traps.

effect0.CN: +50% damage reduction against mechanical traps for creatures around the totem

Desc.CN: Places a totem at the designated location. Attacknig Creatures who die within 10 meters of the totem do not yield essence for the defending player.

effect0.CN: Creatures dying around the totem do not give essence to the opponent

Desc.CN: Available while possessing a Horde type creature. While this ability is active, attacking creatures dying within 5 meters of you are resurrected at their original Chaos Portals and march forward again.

effect0.CN: Resurrects creatures dying around you at their original spawn point

Desc.CN: Available while possessing a normal type creature. While this ability is active, attacking creatures within 5 meters of you gain 50% damage reduction against all damage.

effect0.CN: +50% damage reduction against all damage for creatures around you

Desc.CN: While this ability is active, attacking creatures within 5 meters of you gain +100% damage.

effect0.CN: 对周围生物造成伤害提升+100%

Desc.CN: 技能伤害提升30%!
每秒回复1%最大生命值
技能描述

effect0.CN: 技能效果

Desc.CN: 此技能暂时不能使用。
The creature never stops to fight and moves 50% faster
Summons 5 Arachnopods who run towards the gate on the same path as the caster
This creature attacks by tossing bombs that each damage a single target.

The creature raises a 5 meter radius energy dome that travels with it and has a health of its own (equal to 1/3 of the owner's health). All attacks that would damage creatures underneath the dome damage the shield instead. The shield dissipates when its health is depleted.
You are slowed down.
Creates a blocking wall of ice. Can be destroyed by normal attacks.
There is a 10% chance that a bubble of invulnerability will form around this creature whenever it takes damage. The bubble lasts 2 seconds.
When damaged, this creature cloaks itself for 5 seconds. During this time the creature cannot be targeted, but area effect attacks do damage it.
The creature deals area damage in a 3-meter zone around the target.
Gives nearby creatures shield equal to 2% of their maximum health. The shield acts as extra health for 30 seconds or until it is depleted.
The creature reflects 50% of incoming damage to its attacker with the same damage type
Armored creatures take 80% less damage
The creature launches a bolt of lightning forward, which damages all of its enemies in a 13 meter long, 1.5 meter wide lane.
When it dies this creature resurrects at its original Chaos Portal and will march forward one more time.
Nearby creatures gain +50% movement speed for 10 seconds
The creature creates an icy explosion when it dies. Enemies caught in the explosion are frozen for a short time.

debuffDesc.CN: You are frozen and unable to act for a short time.

Desc.CN: The creature takes 40% less damage
Nearby creatures take 40% less damage
The creature heals 0.1% of its maximum health per second
This creature releases 5-8 Grubshrieks when it dies. The Grubshrieks run towards the gate on the same path as the caster
The creature teleports some distance forward on its path when it takes damage. This ability resets after 5 seconds.
The creature grants +50% damage to nearby creatures when it dies
Whenever an ally dies near this creature, there is a 25% chance that an Eater of the Dead will appear to replace the dead ally.
The creature starts moving 250% faster when its health drops below 40%
The creature heals 5% of its maximum health whenever a nearby ally dies
The creature summons three copies of itself that have 50% health, but are otherwise identical
The creature heals 10% of its maximum health whenever a nearby ally dies
Summons 5 Kobold Wartfiends who run towards the gate on the same path as the caster
The creature continuously shoots bolts of lightning forward for 2 seconds. Enemies in the area take heavy lightning damage.
Provides Ice Immunity to nearby creatures
Ice attacks deal no damage
Fire attacks deal no damage
Provides Fire Immunity to nearby creatures
Nearby creatures heal 0.5% of their maximum health per second
Provides Lightning Immunity to nearby creatures
Ice attacks deal half damage
The creature deals 50% more damage
Provides Poison Immunity to nearby creatures
The creature heals 0.5% of its maximum health per second
Provides Poison Resistance to nearby creatures
The creature heals back 50% of its maximum health to nearby creatures when it dies.
Nearby creatures heal 1% of their maximum health with each attack they perform
Fire attacks deal half damage
Provides Physical Resistance to nearby creatures
Provides Ice Resistance to nearby creatures
Nearby creatures deal 50% more damage
The creature moves 50% faster
The creature has 50% more health
Poison attacks deal no damage
The creature reflects 20% of incoming damage to its attacker with the same damage type
Physical attacks deal no damage
Nearby creatures gain +50% movement speed for 5 seconds. The spell is cast every 10 seconds.
Provides Physical Immunity to nearby creatures
Lightning attacks deal half damage
Ligihtning attacks deal no damage
Provides Lightning Resistance to nearby creatures
Nearby creatures reflect 20% of incoming damage to their attackers with the same damage type
Provides Fire Resistance to nearby creatures
Creatures with this skill continuously repair the creature that spawned them.
Poison attacks deal half damage
Physical attacks deal half damage
Fires an explosive round which creates a large toxic cloud on impact, dealing heavy poison damage.
Disables all traps on the map for 5 seconds.
Disables all traps on the map for 5 seconds.
Launches a bolt of poison that travels in a straight line and deals poison damage.
Launches a bolt of fire that travels in a straight line and deals fire damage.
Creates four ranks of spikes which deal poison damage to enemies who enter. The ranks slowly move closer to each other, trying to entrap enemies.
Launches a bolt of fire that travels in a straight line and deals fire damage.
Summons 5 Rusalkas who run towards the gate on the same path as the caster
The creature releases a shockwave in 360 degrees, dealing physical damage to its enemies and knocking them down
Launches a homing bolt that follows the target for up to 10 seconds. It freezes the target, but deals no damage.
Summons 3 Protector Spirits who provide invulnerability to the caster whlie they are alive
Summons 3 Cogbinders who move forward on the same path as the caster and disable traps
Creates a pool of flames underneath the enemy that deals continuous fire damage until the enemy leaves its area of effect
The creature releases a swarm of bats that follows enemies and deals physical damage to them
The creature releases a swarm of 30 rats that run towards the gate on the same path as the caster
Traps don't activate near this creature
This creature destroys double the amount of Gate Points than it normally would.
The creature freezes the ground ahead of it in a 4 meter wide, 15 meter long area. Enemies caught in the area take heavy ice damage.
The creature causes heavy physical damage to an enemy and heals the same amount on himself
Summons 15 Grubshrieks who fly towards the gate on the same path as the caster
The creature launches up to 3 frost bolts at traps, deactivating and encasing them in ice. To reactivate the traps, the ice layer must be destroyed by normal attacks.
The creature takes 90% less damage while moving. The protection is inactive when the monster stands still.
The creature creates and maintains a portal for 5 seconds, letting 12 Eater of Dead through who move forward following the same path as the caster.
The creature creates and maintains a portal for 5 seconds, letting 14 Kobold Wartfieds through who move forward following the same path as the caster.
The creature creates and maintains a portal for 5 seconds, letting 10 Pale Gentlemen through who move forward following the same path as the caster.
The creature creates and maintains a portal for 5 seconds, letting 4 Kobold Tuskers through who move forward following the same path as the caster.
The creature launches a homing missile at an enemy. The bolt deals poison damage for 5 seconds.
The creature launches a bolt at a trap, diasbling it for 5 seconds.
This creature reassembles itself to three creatures when it dies. The new creatures are lesser versions of the original creature.
The creature teleports forward a small distance after a short delay.
该生物可以汲取附近友军单位的生命力并为自己回复生命值。 附近盟友越多，治疗效果越强。
该单位可以将除自身以外的所有单位（玩家、陷阱、其他怪物）的时间减慢一半。
该单位每隔 25 秒会生产 2 个机械卵。 每个卵会在 4 秒后孵化出 3 只机械蜘蛛。
该单位每隔 80 秒会召唤 3 只维修无人机。 每个无人机会不断修复该单位 1% 最大生命值，直到无人机被摧毁。
该单位会朝向指定位置发射数枚飞弹，击中目标后短暂延迟 2 秒爆炸，对附近 3 码范围造成伤害。

desc.CN: -$VALUE$% 烧伤效果持续时间减少
-$VALUE$% 冻结效果持续时间减少
-$VALUE$% 中毒效果持续时间减少
需要等级达到 $VALUE$ 级才能使用
